author: Pamela Muse
text:
A California city is interested in learning if cities/towns/counties, etc have entered into agreement for shared HR services with other agencies?
If so, please let me know which agencies and contact information if possible.
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Alliance Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Shared HR Services/Resources
